entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Environment.UserInteractive` returns True on mac, even when the process is run in a non-interactive terminal #66530
  • Pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> is worse than String #66529
  • [Mono] Clean up the function calls #66525
    7.0.0
  • .net 6 broken migration JsonElement to dynamic #66517
  • [API Proposal]: Enable Regex filtering for FileSystemWatcher #66516
  • `AccessViolationException` breaks System.IO.FileSystem tests #66515
  • [hot reload] Update test infrastructure to consume metadata update handler type ids #66513
  • [API Proposal]: Set the default encoding of the serial port class to ISO/IEC 8859-1 to accommodate 8-bit bytes out of the box #66506
  • Recent change to Attribute.GetCustomAttributes is breaking in ASP.NET Core #66496
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Math.Abs` overload for `System.Numerics.Complex` as `Complex.Magnitude` property #66494
  • [API Proposal]: Extend `JsonIgnoreCondition` #66490
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteValueTests.SerializeExceedMaximumBufferSize #66487
  • System.Net.CookieContainer的bug，未能正确分辨domain最匹配的 #66526

Closed

  • JIT inlines bits of throw helpers #66527
  • [API Proposal]: Activity.HasRemoteParent (and problematic docs for Activity.Parent) #65660
    7.0.0
  • Transient services implementing IDisposable cause a memory leak #66483
  • Deadlock with SystemEvents when application is shutdown by Restart Manager #62042
    6.0.x
  • SourceBuild leg is not using source-built arcade #66514
  • API Proposal: Primitive Color and Color8 Types for .NET Core #32418
    Future
  • Proposal: Add Temporary and Sparse and to FileOptions #65155
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse42\\Crc32_ro\\Crc32_ro.cmd #65040
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Popcnt\\Popcnt_ro\\Popcnt_ro.cmd #65415
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Fma_Vector256\\Fma_ro\\Fma_ro.cmd #65474
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Bmi1.X64\\Bmi1.X64_r\\Bmi1.X64_r.cmd #65643
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector128\\Vector128_r\\Vector128_r.cmd #66320
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Avx1\\Sqrt_ro\\Sqrt_ro.cmd #64957
  • Bmi2.X64_r failed with Could not load file or assembly 'C:\h\w\BA7A09DC\p\system.runtime.interopservices.dll'. Invalid access to memory location. (0x800703E6) #66484
  • Introduce System.IString interface and implement it on System.String #19711
    Future
  • Add conversion from Task -> CancellationToken method #23346
    Future
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.BinaryWriter_EncodingTests.WriteChars_VeryLargeArray_DoesNotOverflow #66488
  • [API Proposal]: Add Unsafe.AsOut method to simplify out parameters casting #58732
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Append / Enumerable.AppendRange #66336
  • Please introduce methods for reading and writing memory on other processes #46357
    Future
  • Consider adding AppendFormattable to StringBuilder #35047
    Future
  • Enum API #29999
    Future
  • Add NullIfEmpty and NullIfWhitespace for string #28113
    Future
  • Enumerable.Repeat should allow for infinite repetition #28041
    Future
  • Add a way to force-initialize a System.Lazy #27509
    Future
  • OutOfRangeException with expect bounds. #27360
    Future
  • [Proposal] String.Format specifier for IEnumerable #21820
    Future
  • Make `System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHeapHandle` Public #20990
    Future
  • Add Enum method to remove not defined flags. #18190
    Future
  • Support for Time data type #31478
    Future
  • Add XmlReader.ResetState to enable pooling #2404
    Future
  • Question: Furthering use of Span<T> and ReadOnlySpan<T> with string manipulation. #27982
    Future
  • Implement Regex.CompileToAssembly for netcoreapp #30153
    Future
  • API Proposal: Regex.IsMatch with 'out Match' parameter #30308
    Future
  • Avoid need for pragma warning disables in Regex source generator #61666
    7.0.0
  • Extend Regex 32-bit/64-bit read optimization to IgnoreCase as well #62459
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] try this with icu updated #66528
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.4. #66524
    area-Build-mono
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #66522
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Reenable HostApplicationBuilderTests disabled on Mono/Windows #66521
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Re-enable RevokeEndEntity_PolicyErrors_NotTimeValid #66520
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [mono] Less MonoClassField arithmetic and less direct offset access #66519
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix compiler warning 4244 in host #66518
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector WidenLower and WidenUpper on Arm64 #66512
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, needs-author-action
  • Implement X500DistinguishedNameBuilder #66509
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reenable a test in stress mode #66501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assert failure in distribute_free_regions #66495
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use `wasm-tools` workload to run benchmarks for wasm #66493
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix stepping issues with ReadyToRun and TieredCompilation #66491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Load C++/CLI DLLs in default ALC #66486
    area-Host

Merged

  • Add comment for use of DynamicDebugViewEmptyException.Empty #66510
    area-Microsoft.CSharp
  • Add Activity.HasRemoteParent #66489
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Revert "Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type" #66508
    area-System.Reflection
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Android 32 to RID graph #66022
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] update expected exception for cases when all requested TLS versions are disabled #65046
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement, 6.0.x
  • Write the exit code tag from the Apple app wrapper #66511
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Improve SSL platform detection (#64923) #65054
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix early JITDUMP disasm in ARM/ARM64 #66502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #66476
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] improve SslStream tests on misconfigured systems #65024
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add OSR to DacpTieredVersionData #66507
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Fixup name of define #66523
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #66404
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Cleanup todo items from defines-todo.cmake #66408
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector Dot product and Sum on Arm64 #66391
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix catching of generic exception in crossgened shared generic code #66207
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • Use ApiCompatTask in ApiCompat.proj #66073
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for the new WASM Exception Handling feature #66435
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] stabilize QUIC tests on server 2022 #65097
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Run tests for internal azdo PRs #65526
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • don't run WriteChars_VeryLargeArray_DoesNotOverflow test on 32 bit #66503
    area-System.IO
  • Add armv8l virtualized 32-bit ARM core detection #66477
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix minor typo in comment #66497
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Refactor and improve MLL tests #66332
    area-Host
  • Update repo CMake configuration to target /W4 by default #66474
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Avoid realloc and memcpy when >1 gparams on generics #66458
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion property for package references #65614
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • Improve performance of decrypt one shots #65725
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Remove usages of native bootstrapping (#65901) #66406
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [draft] hot reload WIP #66455
    NO-MERGE, area-EnC-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix JsonSerializer src-gen issues with reference handler feature #66422
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985
    area-System.Console, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Build improvements #64938
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    NO-MERGE, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add a target to force packages which reference serviced packages to also be serviced #66106
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Always use SIMD features #66411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • Enable Fast Tail Call Optimization for ARM32 #66282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make ConfigurationManager.Sources public #66485
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview2] Backport `[wasm] Fix a race condition in adding payloads for helix` #66478
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Do not assume containment #66385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add time prefix to (almost) all superpmi.py output #66481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Remove 4146 from libunwind #66427
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885

  • Expose `LibraryImportAttribute` #66434
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add a flag to link against the system brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
